entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
